title: Authentication Service Outage
description: Authentication service experiencing 500 errors after v2.4.0 deployment

ground_truth.root_cause: Deployment v2.4.0 introduced database connection pool exhaustion
ground_truth.solution: Rollback to v2.3.0 and verify database connection pool settings
actions: verify database connection pool max_connections setting
monitor error rates for 5 minutes post-rollback
